subject: Basketball
Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2012)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The United States added the college player of the year, Anthony Davis, and James Harden of the Oklahoma City Thunder to its pool of finalists for its Olympic men’s basketball roster.
snippet: The United States added the college player of the year, Anthony Davis, and James Harden of the Oklahoma City Thunder to its pool of finalists for its Olympic men’s basketball roster.
